member.name: T:Grpc.Net.Client.Web.GrpcWebHandler
member.summary: A implementation that executes gRPC-Web request processing.

remarks.para: This message handler implementation should be used with the .NET client for gRPC to make gRPC-Web calls.

member.name: P:Grpc.Net.Client.Web.GrpcWebHandler.HttpVersion
member.summary:
Gets or sets the HTTP version to use when making gRPC-Web calls.
When a is specified the value will be set on as gRPC-Web calls are made. Changing this property allows the HTTP version of gRPC-Web calls to be overridden.

member.name: P:Grpc.Net.Client.Web.GrpcWebHandler.GrpcWebMode
member.summary:
Gets or sets the gRPC-Web mode to use when making gRPC-Web calls.
When , gRPC-Web calls are made with the application/grpc-web content type, and binary gRPC messages are sent and received.
When , gRPC-Web calls are made with the application/grpc-web-text content type, and base64 encoded gRPC messages are sent and received. Base64 encoding is required for gRPC-Web server streaming calls to stream correctly in browser apps.

member.name: M:Grpc.Net.Client.Web.GrpcWebHandler.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler)
member.param: The inner handler which is responsible for processing the HTTP response messages.

member.name: M:Grpc.Net.Client.Web.GrpcWebHandler.#ctor(Grpc.Net.Client.Web.GrpcWebMode)
member.param: The gRPC-Web mode to use when making gRPC-Web calls.

member.name: M:Grpc.Net.Client.Web.GrpcWebHandler.#ctor(Grpc.Net.Client.Web.GrpcWebMode,System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler)
member.param: The gRPC-Web mode to use when making gRPC-Web calls.
The inner handler which is responsible for processing the HTTP response messages.

member.name: M:Grpc.Net.Client.Web.GrpcWebHandler.SendAsync(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends an HTTP request to the inner handler to send to the server as an asynchronous operation.
member.param: The HTTP request message to send to the server.
A cancellation token to cancel operation.
member.returns: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

member.name: F:Grpc.Net.Client.Web.GrpcWebMode.GrpcWeb
member.summary: Calls are made using the application/grpc-web content type. Request content is not translated to base64.

member.name: F:Grpc.Net.Client.Web.GrpcWebMode.GrpcWebText
member.summary: Calls are made using the application/grpc-web-text content type. Request content is translated to base64.

member.name: T:Grpc.Net.Client.Web.Internal.GrpcWebResponseStream
member.summary: This stream keeps track of messages in the response, and inspects the message header to see if it is for trailers. When the trailers message is encountered then they are parsed as HTTP/1.1 trailers and added to the HttpResponseMessage.TrailingHeaders.

member.name: M:Grpc.Net.Client.Web.Internal.StreamHelpers.WriteAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: WriteAsync uses the best overload for the platform.

member.name: M:Grpc.Net.Client.Web.Internal.StreamHelpers.ReadAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.Memory{System.Byte},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: ReadAsync uses the best overload for the platform. The data must be backed by an array.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the method or property will ensure that the listed field and property members have not-null values when returning with the specified return value condition.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified return value condition and a field or property member.
member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter will not be null.
The field or property member that is promised to be not-null.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes the attribute with the specified return value condition and list of field and property members.
member.param: The return value condition. If the method returns this value, the associated parameter will not be null.
The list of field and property members that are promised to be not-null.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute.Members
member.summary: Gets field or property member names.
